snippet: A 10-year, $12.6 billion bailout plan for Tokyo Electric Power, operator of the nuclear plant damaged in the 2011 tsunami, includes replacing top executives and board members.
abstract: Japan is ready to nationalize Tokyo Electric Power, the operator of the damaged Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant, under a 10-year, 1 trillion yen ($12.5 billion) plan, which includes replacing top executives and board members.
lead_paragraph: A 10-year, $12.6 billion bailout plan for Tokyo Electric Power, operator of the nuclear plant damaged in the 2011 tsunami, includes replacing top executives and board members.

headline.seo: Japan Nears Takeover of Troubled Tokyo Electric Power
headline.print_headline: Takeover Near for Tokyo Electric Power
